headline.main: OPM AIDE CRITICIZES U.S. DEFENSE WORK; May Says We Trial Canada and Britain Despite Advantage

lead_paragraph: Stacy May, chief of the Bureau of Research and Statistics of the Office of Production Management, asserted last night in an address broadcast from station WQXR that the United States had failed to produce its share of arms for the defense of the democracies.
abstract: S May, OPM bur chief, holds Canada and Brit have outstripped U S in mil, naval and air construction
